Class CoursePurchaseService

java.lang.Object
com.github.ilim.backend.service.CoursePurchaseService
@Service public class CoursePurchaseService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing course purchases.

Provides functionalities such as initiating a purchase, confirming or rejecting purchases, checking purchase status, and canceling purchases. Interacts with UserService, CourseService, CoursePurchaseRepo, and PaymentService.

See Also:
  • UserService
  • CourseService
  • CoursePurchaseRepo
  • PaymentService

  • Method Details

    • findAllByStudent

      public List<CoursePurchase> findAllByStudent(@NonNull User student)
      Retrieves all course purchases made by a specific student.
      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      Returns:
      a list of CoursePurchase entities representing the student's purchases

    • findByStudentAndCourse

      public List<CoursePurchase> findByStudentAndCourse(@NonNull User student, @NonNull Course course)
      Retrieves all purchases of a specific course by a student.
      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      Returns:
      a list of CoursePurchase entities for the specified course

    • findPendingByStudentAndCourse

      public CoursePurchase findPendingByStudentAndCourse(@NonNull User student, @NonNull Course course)
      Finds a pending course purchase for a student and course.
      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      Returns:
      the CoursePurchase entity with PurchaseStatus.PENDING
      Throws:
      CantFindCoursePurchaseException - if no pending purchase is found

    • findPendingByStudentAndCourse

      public CoursePurchase findPendingByStudentAndCourse(@NonNull User student, @NonNull Course course, PurchaseStatus status)
      Finds a course purchase with a specific status for a student and course.
      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      status - the PurchaseStatus to filter by
      Returns:
      the CoursePurchase entity matching the criteria
      Throws:
      CantFindCoursePurchaseException - if no matching purchase is found

    • purchaseCourse

      public String purchaseCourse(User student, UUID courseId)
      Initiates the purchase process for a course.

      Validates that the student is not the creator of the course, has not already purchased the course, and does not have any pending purchase requests. Creates a pending purchase and initiates the payment process.

      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course to purchase
      Returns:
      a checkout URL string for the payment process
      Throws:
      CantPurchaseOwnCourseException - if the student is the creator of the course
      AlreadyPurchasedCourseException - if the student has already purchased the course
      PendingPurchaseExistsException - if there is an existing pending purchase request

    • confirmPurchase

      public void confirmPurchase(@NonNull PaymentEventDto paymentEventDto)
      Confirms a successful course purchase.

      Updates the purchase status to PurchaseStatus.SUCCEEDED and records the payment ID.

      Parameters:
      paymentEventDto - the PaymentEventDto containing payment details
      Throws:
      CantFindCoursePurchaseException - if no pending purchase is found for the student and course

    • rejectPurchase

      public void rejectPurchase(PaymentEventDto paymentEventDto, PaymentIntentStatus status)
      Rejects a course purchase due to payment issues.

      Updates the purchase status to PurchaseStatus.FAILED and records the failure reason.

      Parameters:
      paymentEventDto - the PaymentEventDto containing payment details
      status - the PaymentIntentStatus indicating the reason for rejection
      Throws:
      CantFindCoursePurchaseException - if no pending purchase is found for the student and course

    • checkCoursePurchase

      public PurchaseStatus checkCoursePurchase(User student, UUID courseId)
      Checks the purchase status of a course for a student.
      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course
      Returns:
      the PurchaseStatus indicating the purchase state
      Throws:
      NoPurchasesException - if there are no purchases found for the student and course

    • didStudentPurchaseCourse

      public static boolean didStudentPurchaseCourse(CoursePurchaseRepo repo, User student, Course course)
      Determines whether a student has successfully purchased a course.
      Parameters:
      repo - the CoursePurchaseRepo repository
      student - the User entity representing the student
      course - the Course entity representing the course
      Returns:
      true if the student has purchased the course, false otherwise

    • cancelCoursePurchase

      public void cancelCoursePurchase(User student, UUID courseId)
      Cancels a pending course purchase.

      Updates the purchase status to PurchaseStatus.FAILED and records the cancellation reason.

      Parameters:
      student - the User entity representing the student
      courseId - the unique identifier of the course
      Throws:
      CantFindCoursePurchaseException - if no pending purchase is found for the student and course

    • simulateCoursePurchaseConfirmation

      public void simulateCoursePurchaseConfirmation(PaymentEventDto dto)
      Simulates the confirmation of a course purchase.

      Primarily used for integration testing or admin gifting courses to students.

      Parameters:
      dto - the PaymentEventDto containing payment details
